name: Rocket Lancer
description:
This game was made for the Godot wild jam #32. 

In this space shooter your a single space ship on a solo mission to destroy a space tyrant . You get to battle enemies in 7 waves. The last one being the boss. It's an all out non stop action game.

You can collect items to heal yourself, power up and also unlock your full Power. .

Do you have what it takes to survive and cut through your enemies. If you do then click play (obviously)

Thanks for playing

Have fun
